matrix-project.description:
CAPI1&2 : Builds and simulates many different configurations, automatic nightruns on master Contacts : alexandre.castellane@fr.ibm.com or fabrice_moyen@fr.ibm.com
November 2019: Job imported from hdcl070Boeblingen jenkins server Original Combination filter: ((ACT=~ "hls" && HLS=="true") || (ACT=~"hdl" && HDL=="true" )) && ( (CRD=="ADKU3" && ADKU3=="true" && !(ACT=~"NVME" || ACT=~"nvme") && !(ACT=~"hls_scatter_gather") && (SIM_VIV=~"2018.1")) || (CRD=="AD8K5" && AD8K5=="true" && !(ACT=~"NVME" || ACT=~"nvme") && !(ACT=~"hls_scatter_gather") && (SIM_VIV=~"2018.1")) || (CRD=="N250S" && N250S=="true" && !(ACT=~"hls_scatter_gather") && (SIM_VIV=~"2018.1")) || (CRD=="S121B" && S121B=="true" && !(ACT=~"NVME" || ACT=~"nvme") && !(ACT=~"hls_scatter_gather") && (SIM_VIV=~"2018.1")) || (CRD=="RCXVUP" && RCXVUP=="true" && !(ACT=~"NVME" || ACT=~"nvme") && (SIM_VIV=~"2017.4") ) || (CRD=="AD9V3" && AD9V3=="true" && !(ACT=~"NVME" || ACT=~"nvme") && ((SIM_VIV=~"2018.2") || (SIM_VIV=~"2018.3")) ) || (CRD=="U200" && U200=="true" && !(ACT=~"NVME" || ACT=~"nvme") && ((SIM_VIV=~"2018.2") || (SIM_VIV=~"2018.3")) ) || (CRD=="S241" && S241=="true" && !(ACT=~"NVME" || ACT=~"nvme") && ((SIM_VIV=~"2018.2") || (SIM_VIV=~"2018.3")) ) || (CRD=="FX609" && FX609=="true" && !(ACT=~"NVME" || ACT=~"nvme") && ((SIM_VIV=~"2018.2") || (SIM_VIV=~"2018.3")) ) || (CRD=="N250SP" && N250SP=="true" && !(ACT=~"NVME" || ACT=~"nvme") && ((SIM_VIV=~"2018.2") || (SIM_VIV=~"2018.3")) ) || (CRD=="U200" && U200=="true" && !(ACT=~"NVME" || ACT=~"nvme") && (SIM_VIV=~"2018.3")) ) && ((SIM_VIV=~"irun" && IRUN=="true") || (SIM_VIV=~"xsim" && XSIM=="true") || (SIM_VIV=~"xcelium" && XCELIUM=="true")) || (ACT=="test" && CRD=="ADKU3" && SIM_VIV=~"xsim")
April 26th 2019 : filter : CAPI1 2018.1 CAPI2 2018.2or 3, U200 2018.3 RCXVUP 2017.4
2018 nov 19 : Removed xcelium_2018.2 variable as we can't support it now. Removed hls_intersect_s & hls_intersect_h from matrix

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BRANCH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Choose the branch for https://github.com/open-power/snap you want to test. Please do not use wildcards!!

matrix-project.combinationFilter: ((ACT=~ "hls" && HLS=="true") || (ACT=~"hdl" && HDL=="true" )) && ( (CRD=="AD9V3" && AD9V3=="true" && !(ACT=~"NVME" || ACT=~"nvme") && ACT=~"helloworld" && ((SIM_VIV=~"2018.2") || (SIM_VIV=~"2018.3"))) || (CRD=="ADKU3" && ADKU3=="true" && !(ACT=~"NVME" || ACT=~"nvme") && ACT=~"helloworld" && (SIM_VIV=~"2018.1")) ) && (( SIM_VIV=~"irun" && IRUN=="true") || (SIM_VIV=~"xsim" && XSIM=="true") || (SIM_VIV=~"xcelium" && XCELIUM=="true")) || (ACT=="test" && CRD=="ADKU3" && SIM_VIV=~"xsim")

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
set +x # reduce Jenkins output echo "****************************************************************************************" echo "`date` BUILD START" echo "****************************************************************************************" echo "EXECUTING FIRST SHELL FROM CAPI1&2 SIM JENKINS ..." echo "****************************************************************************************" echo
#============================================================================================== # Variables
> export_props.properties NAME=$(echo $GIT_BRANCH| cut -d'/' -f 2 |tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]') # remove origin/ from branch and translate to lowercase PREFIX=$(echo $NAME| cut -d'_' -f 1) # chars up to first '_' identify need for test ACTION_TYPE=$(echo $ACT| cut -d'_' -f 1 |tr '[:lower:]' '[:upper:]') # get ACTION_TYPE (hls, hld) and translate to uppercase SIM=$(echo $SIM_VIV| cut -d'_' -f 1 |tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]') # chars up to first '_' identify Simulator and translate to lowercase VIV=$(echo $SIM_VIV| cut -d'_' -f 2) # chars behind first '_' identify Vivado version
CAPI2CardsList=( N250SP FX609 S241 RCXVUP AD9V3 U200 ) CAPI2=0 for i in ${CAPI2CardsList[@]}; do if [ "$CRD" == "$i" ]; then CAPI2=1; fi done
echo "Build with Card=$CRD CAPI2=$CAPI2 Action=$ACT Action_type=$ACTION_TYPE branch_selected=$BRANCH git_branch=$NAME prefix=$PREFIX"
EmailDestinationList=( fabrice_moyen@fr.ibm.com fabricepb@free.fr )
#============================================================================================== # Functions
# Function for sending alerting emails # Example 1: SendAnEmail -s "This is the subject/alert" -d firstDest@gmail.com -d SecondDest@free.fr # Example 2: SendAnEmail -s "This is the subject/alert" -d "${EmailDestinationList[*]}" function SendAnEmail { local OPTIND opt DestList while getopts "s:d:" opt do case $opt in s) Subject="$OPTARG" ;; d) DestList+=("$OPTARG") ;; esac done
for i in ${DestList[@]} do echo "" | mail -s "$Subject" $i done }
#============================================================================================== # Do not run non-desired cases (action types, actions, cards) # BSKIP stands for board skip
BSKIP=0 if [ "${!ACTION_TYPE}" == "false" ]; then BSKIP=1;fi # if ACTION_TYPE="HLS", ${!ACTION_TYPE} is identical to $HLS if [ "${!CRD}" == "false" ]; then BSKIP=1;fi # if CRD="AD9V3", ${!CRD} is identical to $AD9V3 if [ "$ACT" == "test" ]; then BSKIP=0;fi
echo "action_types (hdl,hls)=$ACTION_TYPE enabled_cards=$CRD BSKIP=$BSKIP"
# Following filtering will stop the current test if not required or not possible # This will lead to a brown colored result meaning : aborted # ASKIP may stand for ACTION skip case "$CRD:$ACT:$SIM:$CAPI2" in *:hls_scatter_gather:*:0 ) C="scc1";ASKIP=1;; # no scatter_gather for CAPI1 cards // test done by jenkins filter , could be removed, as well as the CAPI2 variable *:*DENALI*:xsim:* ) C="NVMD";ASKIP=1;; # DENALI doesnt work with xsim *:*NVME*:xsim:* ) C="NVMX";ASKIP=1;; *:*nvme*:xsim:* ) C="nvmX";ASKIP=1;; *:hdl_example.*RAM:xcelium:* )C="xce0";ASKIP=0;; # test xcelium on some hdl_example actions *:*:xcelium:* ) C="xce1";ASKIP=1;; # disable xcelium on all other actions # AC 20180921 : removing intersect sims *:hls_intersect_h:*:* ) C="inth";ASKIP=1;; *:hls_intersect_s:*:* ) C="ints";ASKIP=1;; *:hls_search:xsim:* ) C="srhx";ASKIP=1;; # too long testtime, wait for xsim performance fix *:hls_blowfish:*:* ) C="blow";ASKIP=1;; # no maintenance for blowfish *:hls_parallel_memcpy:*:*) if [[ $BRANCH != "emrick" ]]; then C="pmcp"; ASKIP=1 elif [[ $CRD != "AD9V3" && $CRD != "N250SP" ]]; then C="pmcp"; ASKIP=1 fi;; *:hls_vector_generator:*:*) if [[ $BRANCH != "emrick" ]]; then C="vgen"; ASKIP=1 elif [[ $CRD != "AD9V3" && $CRD != "N250SP" ]]; then C="vgen"; ASKIP=1 fi;; * ) C="def" ;ASKIP=0;; esac
echo "card=$CRD CAPI2=$CAPI2 action=$ACT Sim=$SIM VIV=$VIV case=$C ASKIP=$ASKIP"
#============================================================================================== # Cleaning directories if ACT=test, # else checking $CRD.action.defconfig file existence
echo;echo "*******************************************************************************"
case "$ACT" in test ) echo "ACT=test" echo gitnames=`git ls-remote ${GIT_URL}|grep "refs/heads/"|awk '{print $2}'`; RC=$? echo "RC=$RC gitnames=$gitnames"
echo # for dir in "/afs/bb/proj/fpga/framework/CI_ws/SNAP_SIM_matrix"/*;do for dir in "/var/jenkins/workspace/SNAP_SIM_matrix"/*;do if [ -d "$dir" ];then branch="refs/heads/"`basename $dir` if [[ "$gitnames" =~ "$branch" ]];then echo "branch=$branch found in gitnames, keeping dir=$dir" else echo "branch=$branch not found in gitnames, deleting dir=\'$dir\'" rm -rf "$dir" # put in quotes to work for directories with blanks fi else echo "$dir is not a directory, continuing" fi done DSKIP=0 ;;
*"hls_intersect"* ) echo "Checking snap/defconfig/$CRD.hls_intersect.defconfig existence (ACT=$ACT)" if [ -f snap/defconfig/$CRD.hls_intersect.defconfig ];then DSKIP=0 else echo "$CRD.hls_intersect.defconfig does not exist" ls snap/defconfig/ DSKIP=1 fi ;;
*DENALI* ) act2=${ACT%.DENALI} echo "Checking snap/defconfig/$CRD.$act2.defconfig existence (ACT=$ACT)" if [ -f snap/defconfig/$CRD.$act2.defconfig ];then DSKIP=0 else echo "$CRD.$act2.defconfig does not exist" ls snap/defconfig/ DSKIP=1 fi ;;
* ) echo "Checking snap/defconfig/$CRD.hls_$ACT.defconfig existence" if [ -f snap/defconfig/$CRD.$ACT.defconfig ];then DSKIP=0 else echo "$CRD.$ACT.defconfig does not exist" ls snap/defconfig/ DSKIP=1 fi ;; esac
echo;echo "defconfig SKIP=$DSKIP"
#============================================================================================== # Checking enough space is available
echo;echo "*******************************************************************************" echo "J: Checking enough space is available" echo
#AFSused=`fs lq /afs/bb/proj/fpga/framework/CI_ws/SNAP_SIM_matrix/|grep -v Used|awk '{print $4}'|sed 's/%//g'|sed 's/<//g'` diskused=`df -h /var/jenkins/workspace/OC_IMG_matrix|grep -v Used|awk '{print $5}'|sed 's/%//g'|sed 's/<//g'` SSKIP=0;msg="disk usage =${diskused}%"
if (( diskused > 90 ));then msg="ERROR: $msg, stopping additional builds";SSKIP=1 #SendAnEmail -s "ERROR: Disk space is used up to ${diskused}%, stopping additional builds" -d "${EmailDestinationList[*]}" #SendAnEmail -s "ERROR: AFS space is used up to ${AFSused}%, stopping additional builds" -d "${EmailDestinationList[*]}"
elif (( diskused > 70 ));then msg="WARNING: $msg" #SendAnEmail -s "WARNING: Disk space is used up to ${diskused}%" -d "${EmailDestinationList[*]}" #SendAnEmail -s "WARNING: AFS space is used up to ${AFSused}%" -d "${EmailDestinationList[*]}"
else msg="OK: $msg" fi echo "$msg"
#============================================================================================== # Aborting if something went wrong
if [ "$ASKIP" == "1" ] || [ "$DSKIP" == "1" ] || [ "$BSKIP" == "1" ] || [ "$SSKIP" == "1" ];then SKIP=1;else SKIP=0;fi
#============================================================================================== # Passing parameters to next script
echo;echo "*******************************************************************************" echo "J: Forwarding parameters to next script" echo
echo "SKIP=$SKIP" >> export_props.properties echo "CRD=$CRD" >> export_props.properties echo "CL=$CL" >> export_props.properties echo "CAPI2=$CAPI2" >> export_props.properties echo "SIM=$SIM" >> export_props.properties echo "VIV=$VIV" >> export_props.properties echo "EmailDestinationList=( ${EmailDestinationList[*]} )" >> export_props.properties
echo "properties passed to next shell:" cat export_props.properties echo;echo "*******************************************************************************" echo

#!/bin/bash
set +x # reduce Jenkins output #ulimit -c unlimited # reduce core dumps from what .profile says (kB) ulimit -S -c 128000
echo "****************************************************************************************" echo "EXECUTING SECOND SHELL FROM CAPI1&2 SIM JENKINS (`date`)" echo "****************************************************************************************" echo "Simulating with Card=$CRD Action=$ACT CLOUD=$CL CAPI2=$CAPI2" echo
#============================================================================================== # Variables
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/bin # python3 needs this path setup export USERHOME=`pwd` export SNAP_ROOT=$USERHOME/snap
#echo;echo "********************************************************************************" #echo "J: LSF SETUP ..." # echo # older setup up to RH6 #export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/bin:/home/lsfbb/prod/10.1/linux2.6-glibc2.3-x86_64/bin #export LSF_SERVERDIR=/home/lsfbb/prod/10.1/linux2.6-glibc2.3-x86_64/etc #export LSF_LIBDIR=/home/lsfbb/prod/10.1/linux2.6-glibc2.3-x86_64/lib #export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$LD_LIBRARY_PATH:/home/lsfbb/prod/10.1/linux2.6-glibc2.3-x86_64/lib #export LSF_BINDIR=/home/lsfbb/prod/10.1/linux2.6-glibc2.3-x86_64/bin #export LSF_SUBMITTER_OSTYPE=Linux #export LSF_ENVDIR=/home/lsfbb/prod/conf #LSF='-P zsort -M 2 -C 2000 -I -n 4 -R type=X86_64 -R span[hosts=1]' # Project, GB_mem, KB_core, #_processors, type of processor
# new setup for RH7 #export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/bin:/home/lsfbb/prod/10.1/linux3.10-glibc2.17-x86_64/bin #export LSF_SERVERDIR=/home/lsfbb/prod/10.1/linux3.10-glibc2.17-x86_64/etc #export LSF_LIBDIR=/home/lsfbb/prod/10.1/linux3.10-glibc2.17-x86_64/lib #export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$LD_LIBRARY_PATH:/home/lsfbb/prod/10.1/linux3.10-glibc2.17-x86_64/lib #export LSF_BINDIR=/home/lsfbb/prod/10.1/linux3.10-glibc2.17-x86_64/bin #export LSF_SUBMITTER_OSTYPE=Linux #export LSF_ENVDIR=/home/lsfbb/prod/conf #LSF='-P zsort -M 2 -C 2000 -I -n 4 -R type=X86_64 -R osver=rh7 -R span[hosts=1]' # Project, GB_mem, KB_core, #_processors, type of processor
#============================================================================================== # Functions
# Function for sending alerting emails # Example 1: SendAnEmail -s "This is the subject/alert" -d firstDest@gmail.com -d SecondDest@free.fr # Example 2: SendAnEmail -s "This is the subject/alert" -d "${EmailDestinationList[*]}" function SendAnEmail { local OPTIND opt DestList while getopts "s:d:" opt do case $opt in s) Subject="$OPTARG" ;; d) DestList+=("$OPTARG") ;; esac done
for i in ${DestList[@]} do echo "" | mail -s "$Subject" $i done }
#============================================================================================== # Power Service Layer Simulation Engine (pslse) setup
echo;echo "*******************************************************************************" echo "J: Getting Power Service Layer Simulation Engine Environment (pslse)..." echo
echo;echo "Deleting old ./pslse (Power Service Layer Simulation Engine) directory" rm -rf pslse
PSLSE_Branch=master
echo;echo "Getting (git clone) PSL Simulation Environment branch=$PSLSE_Branch for card=$CRD..." git clone -b $PSLSE_Branch https://github.com/ibm-capi/pslse pslse; echo "git clone PSLSE RC=$?"
cd ${SNAP_ROOT} echo;echo "Exporting PSLSE directory as : ${USERHOME}/pslse into snap_env.sh" echo "export PSLSE_ROOT=$USERHOME/pslse" >snap_env.sh echo "#PSL_DCP not included in Simulation, replaced anyhow by PSLSE" >>snap_env.sh echo "#export PSL_DCP=/afs/bb/proj/fpga/framework/cards/$CRD/current/b_route_design.dcp" >>snap_env.sh echo "#setup: XILINX_LOCAL_USER_DATA=${XILINX_LOCAL_USER_DATA}, overwrite=no to prevent write access error in XilincTclStore (tclapp:load_apps)" >>snap_env.sh echo "export XILINX_LOCAL_USER_DATA=no" >> snap_env.sh
# FAB: but why ?? #case $CRD in # 'N250SP') #echo "export PSL_IP_CORE=/afs/bb/proj/fpga/framework/cards/N250SP/ibm.com_CAPI_PSL9_WRAP_2.00.zip" >>snap_env.sh # echo "export HDK_ROOT=/afs/bb/proj/fpga/framework/cards/N250SP/HDK" >>snap_env.sh # ;; # *) ;; #esac
#============================================================================================== # Adding specificities for specific card (such as another Vivado version)
# FAB: CDS_INST_DIR & IES_LIBS ??
#case $SIM:$VIV:$CRD in # test multiple Vivado versions in one build # # *RCXVUP) # adding specificity for RCXVUP card using an -es part (requires VIV2017.4) AC 20180921 # VIV="2017.4" # force 2017.4 for RCXVUP # export VIV_VERSION="2017.4"; export IES_VERSION="15.20.s18" # export CDS_INST_DIR=/afs/bb/proj/cte/tools/cds/Incisiv/${IES_VERSION} # export IES_LIBS=/afs/bb/proj/fpga/framework/ies_libs/viv${VIV_VERSION}/ies${IES_VERSION} # ;; # # *U200) # force 2018.3 for U200 as it is not supported in earlier versions # VIV="2018.3" # export VIV_VERSION="2018.3"; export IES_VERSION="15.20.s18" # export CDS_INST_DIR=/afs/bb/proj/cte/tools/cds/Incisiv/${IES_VERSION} # export IES_LIBS=/afs/bb/proj/fpga/framework/ies_libs/viv${VIV_VERSION}/ies${IES_VERSION} # ;; # # xcelium:2018*:*) # Xcelium needs Vivado 2018.1 or higher # export VIV_VERSION=$VIV; export IES_VERSION="17.10.002" # export CDS_INST_DIR=/afs/bb/proj/cte/tools/cds/Xcelium/${IES_VERSION} # export IES_LIBS=/afs/bb/proj/fpga/framework/ies_libs/viv${VIV_VERSION}/xce${IES_VERSION} # ;; # # xcelium:*:*) # echo "unsupported Vivado version $VIV for XCELIUM" # exit 1 # ;; # # *:2016.4:*) # export VIV_VERSION="2016.4"; export IES_VERSION="15.10.s19" # export CDS_INST_DIR=/afs/bb/proj/cte/tools/cds/Incisiv/${IES_VERSION} # # export IES_LIBS=/afs/bb/proj/fpga/framework/ies_libs/viv${VIV_VERSION}/ies${IES_VERSION} # ;; # # *2017.4!*|*2018.1:*|*2018.2:*|*2018.3:*) # adding 2018.3 for U200 # export VIV_VERSION=$VIV; export IES_VERSION="15.20.s18" # export CDS_INST_DIR=/afs/bb/proj/cte/tools/cds/Incisiv/${IES_VERSION}# # export IES_LIBS=/afs/bb/proj/fpga/framework/ies_libs/viv${VIV_VERSION}/ies${IES_VERSION} # ;; # # *) # echo "unsupported Vivado version $VIV" # exit 1 # ;; # #esac
#============================================================================================== # Setting up Vivado and Timing value
echo;echo "****************************************************************************************" echo "J: Setting up Vivado Version and timing value" echo
# export VIV_VERSION="2017.4"; export IES_VERSION="15.20.s18" # same version for all configs
echo "Vivado SETUP $VIV_VERSION ..."
# FAB: TIMING_LABLIMIT. On le configure ?
echo;echo "****************************************************************************************" echo "J: Vivado paths & licences server setup ..." export XILINX_ROOT=/opt/Xilinx #export XILINX_ROOT=/afs/bb/proj/fpga/xilinx export XILINXD_LICENSE_FILE=2100@pokwinlic1.pok.ibm.com source $XILINX_ROOT/Vivado/${VIV_VERSION}/settings64.sh
#============================================================================================== # Cadence setup
# FAB: No cadence setup at MOP #echo;echo "****************************************************************************************" #echo "J: Cadence SETUP ..." #case $SIM:$VIV in # xcelium:2018.2 ) echo "Cadence SETUP $IES_VERSION for Vivado 2018.2" # export PATH=$CDS_INST_DIR/tools/bin:$PATH # export CDS_LIC_FILE=1716@rchlic1.rchland.ibm.com:1716@rchlic2.rchland.ibm.com:1716@rchlic3.rchland.ibm.com # export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$CDS_INST_DIR/tools/lib/64bit:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH # if [ -f "$IES_LIBS/cds.lib" ]; then # echo "IES_LIBS found in $IES_LIBS" # else # echo "WARNING: cannot find IES_LIBS=$IES_LIBS, Cadence compilation won't work" # exit 1 # fi;; # irun:*|IRUN:*|xcelium:* ) echo "Cadence SETUP $IES_VERSION for Vivado 2018.1" # export PATH=$CDS_INST_DIR/tools/bin:$PATH # export CDS_LIC_FILE=1716@rchlic1.rchland.ibm.com:1716@rchlic2.rchland.ibm.com:1716@rchlic3.rchland.ibm.com # export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$CDS_INST_DIR/tools/lib/64bit:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH # if [ -f "$IES_LIBS/cds.lib" ]; then # echo "IES_LIBS found in $IES_LIBS" # else # echo "WARNING: cannot find IES_LIBS=$IES_LIBS, Cadence compilation won't work" # exit 1 # fi;; #esac
#case $ACT in # *"nvme"*|*"NVME"*) echo "Denali SETUP ..." # export DENALI=/afs/bb/proj/cte/tools/cds/VIPCAT/11.30.037/tools.lnx86/denali_64bit #export CDS_LIC_FILE=1716@rchlic1.rchland.ibm.com:1716@rchlic2.rchland.ibm.com:1716@rchlic3.rchland.ibm.com # ;; #esac #echo "CDS_LIC_FILE=${CDS_LIC_FILE}"
#============================================================================================== # If ACT=test just doing nothing (exit 0), # else making $CRD.$ACT.defconfig
echo;echo "****************************************************************************************"
case $ACT in # select config & compile action
'test') echo "J: ACT=$ACT ==> skiping model building";echo echo " ==> Just EXITING !" exit 0 ;;
'hls_intersect_h') echo "J: ACT=$ACT (hash) ==> Configuring image thanks to $CRD.hls_intersect.defconfig file and doing make clean_config_h ...";echo make $CRD.hls_intersect.defconfig source ./snap_env.sh # execute to exploit ACTION_ROOT make -C ${ACTION_ROOT} clean config_h ;;
'hls_intersect_s') echo "J: ACT=$ACT (sort) ==> Configuring image thanks to $CRD.hls_intersect.defconfig file and doing make clean_config_s ...";echo make $CRD.hls_intersect.defconfig source ./snap_env.sh # execute to exploit ACTION_ROOT make -C ${ACTION_ROOT} clean config_s ;;
*DENALI*) act2=${ACT%.DENALI} echo "J: ACT=$ACT ==> Configuring image thanks to $CRD.$act2.defconfig file ...";echo make $CRD.$act2.defconfig ;;
*) echo "J: Generic case ==> Just configuring image thanks to $CRD.$ACT.defconfig file...";echo make $CRD.$ACT.defconfig ;; esac
#============================================================================================== # Configure SIMULATOR and ACTION types
echo;echo "****************************************************************************************" echo "J: Configuring SIMULATOR and ACTION types with SIMULATOR=$SIM and ACTION=$ACT" echo
case $SIM:$ACT in 'xsim':* ) echo "export SIMULATOR=xsim" >> .snap_config.sh sed -i "s/^SIM_/# SIM_/" .snap_config echo "SIM_XSIM=y" >> .snap_config # overwrite simulator ;;
'irun':*DENALI ) echo "ENABLE_DENALI=y" >> .snap_config;make -s oldconfig echo "export SIMULATOR=irun" >> .snap_config.sh sed -i "s/^SIM_/# SIM_/" .snap_config echo "SIM_IRUN=y" >> .snap_config # overwrite simulator ;;
'irun':* ) echo "export SIMULATOR=irun" >> .snap_config.sh sed -i "s/^SIM_/# SIM_/" .snap_config echo "SIM_IRUN=y" >> .snap_config # overwrite simulator ;;
xcelium:*DENALI) echo "ENABLE_DENALI=y" >> .snap_config;make -s oldconfig echo "export SIMULATOR=xcelium" >> .snap_config.sh sed -i "s/^SIM_/# SIM_/" .snap_config echo "SIM_XCELIUM=y" >> .snap_config # overwrite simulator ;;
xcelium:*) echo "export SIMULATOR=xcelium" >> .snap_config.sh sed -i "s/^SIM_/# SIM_/" .snap_config echo "SIM_XCELIUM=y" >> .snap_config # overwrite simulator ;;
questa:*) echo "export SIMULATOR=questa" >> .snap_config.sh sed -i "s/^SIM_/# SIM_/" .snap_config echo "SIM_QUESTA=y" >> .snap_config # overwrite simulator ;;
modelsim:*) echo "export SIMULATOR=modelsim" >> .snap_config.sh sed -i "s/^SIM_/# SIM_/" .snap_config echo "SIM_MODELSIM=y" >> .snap_config # overwrite simulator ;;
*) echo "WARNING: unknown simulator=$SIM, continuing with default" ;;
esac
#============================================================================================== # Build Simulation Model (make model)
echo;echo "****************************************************************************************" echo "J: Building simulation model (make model)" echo
# execute with LSF, SNAP_ROOT must reside in AFS #bsub $LSF -J "${CRD}_${ACT}_${SIM}_model" "make model"|| exit 1
# alias make='/usr/bin/make -I $XILINX_ROOT/Vivado/${VIV_VERSION}/data/xsim/include/'
echo "XILINX_ROOT/Vivado/${VIV_VERSION}/data/xsim/include/ :" ls -lad $XILINX_ROOT/Vivado/${VIV_VERSION}/data/xsim/include/
echo "XILINX_VIVADO = $XILINX_VIVADO"
echo; echo "ENV:" env echo
make model ||RC=$? if [ $RC -ne 0 ]; then echo "make model FAILED !" echo " ==> EXITING !" exit 1 fi
#============================================================================================== # Run $SIM simulation
echo;echo "****************************************************************************************" echo "J: Running $SIM Simulation ..."
cd ${SNAP_ROOT}/hardware/sim
# enable SW trace #export SNAP_TRACE=0xf
# report error as unstable build case $SIM in
'irun' ) # bsub $LSF -J "${CRD}_${ACT}_${SIM}" "./run_sim -irun -list testlist.sh -noaet"||exit 100 ./run_sim -irun -list testlist.sh -noaet || exit 100 ;;
*) # bsub $LSF -J "${CRD}_${ACT}_${SIM}" "./run_sim -list testlist.sh -noaet"||exit 100 ./run_sim -list testlist.sh -noaet || exit 100 ;;
esac
